title: Violence & Dignity: Reflections on the Middle East, Noam Chomsky (2013)
description:
Professor Noam Chomsky, delivering the 2013 Edward W Said Lecture: Violence and Dignity â€“ Reflections on the Middle East at Friends House in London on 18th March 2013. With introductions by Omar Al-Qattan and Mariam C Said.

The annual Edward W Said London Lecture is part of a series of cultural events and exhibitions programmed in association with The Mosaic Rooms (www.mosaicrooms.org) and the A M Qattan Foundation (www.qattanfoundation.org) to improve cultural and intellectual understanding of the Arabic world, and provide a platform for discourse and debate.  The lecture is sponsored by The London Review of Books (www.lrb.co.uk).
